report.name: amtlis04

dataSource.name: Q_AMTLIS04
dataSource.select: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Query Etat AMTLIS04 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT 'pagea', --TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY') As dc_ancouran, bip.pid AS dc_pid, SUBSTR(bip.pnom, 1, 24) AS dc_pnom, ------------- Statut et Date du statut ------------------------------------ --DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, bex.moismens ), -- bip.adatestatut, bip.astatut, -- ' ' -- ) AS dc_statut, DECODE( LEAST( bip.adatestatut, bex.moismens ), bip.adatestatut, TO_CHAR(bip.adatestatut, 'MM/YYYY'), NULL ) AS dc_adatestatut, ------------- Montants HT années précédentes ----------------------- pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 5, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins5, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 4, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins4, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 3, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins3, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 2, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins2, pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 1, bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_moins1, ------------- Montants HT années Cour --------------------------------- pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_ancour(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), bip.adatestatut) AS dc_mt_an_cour , ( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid,TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE), 9, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an_moins9, ( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE), 8, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an_moins8, ( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE), 7, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an_moins7, ( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE),6, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an_moins6 FROM ligne_bip bip, datdebex bex WHERE 1 = 1 -- Projets en charge sans abandon de projet AND bip.astatut='C' -- date statut<= date derniere mensuelle AND bip.adatestatut<=bex.moismens -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table ligne_bip -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Non existence dans tables exceptions AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) -- Restrictions sur Type projet AND ( (bip.typproj = 1) OR (bip.astatut IN ('O', 'A', 'C', 'D')) ) -- -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table proplus -- Ne prendre que ligne BIP si existence FACTPID associé dans proplus -- et vérifiant critères indiqués dans Spec!!! -------------------------------------------------------------- -- BEG TEST DE HUNG et NOI -- Restriction sur Proplus et prendre les lignes bip dans ligne_bip qui n'existent pas dans histo_amort AND ( (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) OR ( bip.adatestatut is NULL OR (bip.adatestatut <= trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) -- END TEST DE HUNG et NOI AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) ORDER BY bip.pid ;

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE ( LEAST ( bip.adatestatut , bex.moismens ) , bip.adatestatut , TO_CHAR ( bip.adatestatut , 'MM/YYYY' ) , NULL )

dataSource.name: Q_1995
dataSource.select: SELECT ------------- Montants HT années précédentes ----------------------- sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE5), 4, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an5_moins4, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE5), 3, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an5_moins3, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE5), 2, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an5_moins2, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE5), 1, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an5_moins1, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE),5, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an5 FROM ligne_bip bip, datdebex bex WHERE 1 = 1 -- Anneeref AND bip.adatestatut between to_date ( '01/12/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE5-1),'DD/MM/YYYY') AND to_date ( '01/11/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE5),'DD/MM/YYYY') -- immo passées en charge sans abandon de projet AND bip.astatut='C' -- date statut<= date derniere mensuelle AND bip.adatestatut<=bex.moismens -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table ligne_bip -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Non existence dans tables exceptions AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) AND ( (bip.typproj = 1) OR (bip.astatut IN ('O', 'A', 'C', 'D')) ) AND ( (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) OR ( bip.adatestatut is NULL OR (bip.adatestatut <= trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) ;

dataSource.name: Q_1996
dataSource.select: SELECT ------------- Montants HT années précédentes ----------------------- sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE4), 4, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an4_moins4, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE4), 3, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an4_moins3, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE4), 2, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an4_moins2, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE4), 1, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an4_moins1, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE), 4, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an4 FROM ligne_bip bip, datdebex bex WHERE 1 = 1 -- Anneeref=annee encours -4 AND bip.adatestatut between to_date ( '01/12/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE4-1),'DD/MM/YYYY') AND to_date ( '01/11/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE4),'DD/MM/YYYY') -- immo passées en charge sans abandon de projet AND bip.astatut='C' -- date statut<= date derniere mensuelle AND bip.adatestatut<=bex.moismens -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table ligne_bip -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Non existence dans tables exceptions AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) AND ( (bip.typproj = 1) OR (bip.astatut IN ('O', 'A', 'C', 'D')) ) AND ( (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid) OR ( bip.adatestatut is NULL OR (bip.adatestatut <= trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) ;

dataSource.name: Q_1997
dataSource.select: SELECT ------------- Montants HT années précédentes ----------------------- sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE3), 4, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an3_moins4, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE3), 3, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an3_moins3, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, between to_date ( '01/12/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE3-1),'DD/MM/YYYY') AND to_date ( '01/11/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE3),'DD/MM/YYYY') ---- immo passées en charge sans abandon de projet AND bip.astatut='C' -- date trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) ;

dataSource.name: Q_1998
dataSource.select: SELECT ------------- Montants HT années précédentes ----------------------- sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE2), 4, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an2_moins4, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE2), 3, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an2_moins3, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE2), 2, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an2_moins2, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE2), 1, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an2_moins1, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE), 2, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an2 FROM ligne_bip bip, datdebex bex WHERE 1 = 1 -- Anneeref=annee encours-2 AND bip.adatestatut between to_date ( '01/12/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE2-1),'DD/MM/YYYY') AND to_date ( '01/11/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE2),'DD/MM/YYYY') -- -- immo passées en charge sans abandon de projet AND bip.astatut='C' -- date statut<= date derniere mensuelle AND bip.adatestatut<=bex.moismens -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table ligne_bip ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) AND ( (bip.typproj = 1) OR (bip.astatut IN ('O', 'A', 'C', 'D')) ) AND ( (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) OR ( bip.adatestatut is NULL OR (bip.adatestatut <= trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) ;

dataSource.name: Q_1999
dataSource.select: SELECT ------------- Montants HT années précédentes ----------------------- sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE1), 4, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an1_moins4, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE1), 3, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an1_moins3, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE1), 2, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an1_moins2, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE1), 1, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an1_moins1, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE), 1, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an1 FROM ligne_bip bip, datdebex bex WHERE 1 = 1 -- Anneeref=annee encours-1 AND bip.adatestatut between to_date ( '01/12/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE1-1),'DD/MM/YYYY') AND to_date ( '01/11/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE1),'DD/MM/YYYY') -- immo passées en charge sans abandon de projet AND bip.astatut='C' -- date statut<= date derniere mensuelle AND bip.adatestatut<=bex.moismens -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table ligne_bip -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Non existence dans tables exceptions AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) AND ( (bip.typproj = 1) OR (bip.astatut IN ('O', 'A', 'C', 'D')) ) AND ( (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid ) OR ( bip.adatestatut is NULL OR (bip.adatestatut <= trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) ;

dataSource.name: Q_2000
dataSource.select: SELECT ------------- Montants HT années précédentes ----------------------- sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 4, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an0_moins4, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 3, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an0_moins3, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 2, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an0_moins2, sum( pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_anprec(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), 1, bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an0_moins1, ------------- Montants HT années Cour --------------------------------- sum(pack_verif_amtlis01.f_immo_montant_ht_ancour(bip.pid, TO_CHAR(bex.datdebex, 'YYYY'), bip.adatestatut)) AS dc_mt_an0 FROM ligne_bip bip, datdebex bex WHERE 1 = 1 -- Anneeref=annee encours AND bip.adatestatut between to_date ( '01/12/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE-1),'DD/MM/YYYY') AND to_date ( '01/11/'||TO_CHAR( :P_ANNEE),'DD/MM/YYYY') -- immo passées en charge sans abandon de projet AND bip.astatut='C' -- date statut<= date derniere mensuelle AND bip.adatestatut<=bex.moismens -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restrictions sur Table ligne_bip -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Non existence dans tables exceptions AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex1dpg WHERE codex = bip.codsg) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex2dprojet WHERE codex = TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ex3lbip WHERE codex = bip.pid ) AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM client_mo cmo, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.clicode = cmo.clicode AND fil.filcode = cmo.filcode ) ------------------------------------------------------------------- -- 04/04/2001:Top immobilisation (TOP_IMMO/filiale_cli) != 'N' (ME) ------------------------------------------------------------------- AND 'N' != ( SELECT fil.top_immo FROM struct_info s, filiale_cli fil WHERE bip.codsg = s.codsg AND fil.filcode = s.filcode ) AND ( (bip.typproj = 1) OR (bip.astatut IN ('O', 'A', 'C', 'D')) ) AND ( (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM histo_amort his WHERE bip.pid = his.pid) OR ( bip.adatestatut is NULL OR (bip.adatestatut <= trunc(bex.moismens,'MONTH') AND bip.adatestatut >= trunc(bex.moismens,'YEAR') ) ) ) ) AND (:p_param5=0 OR bip.codsg IN (select s.codsg from struct_info s where s.scentrefrais = :p_param5)) ;

textSegment.string: --- TOTAL SORTIE D'IMMOBILISATIONS AU TITRE DE &F_AN_MOINS5 ---
--- TOTAL SORTIE D'IMMOBILISATIONS AU TITRE DE &F_AN_MOINS4 ---
--- TOTAL SORTIE D'IMMOBILISATION AU TITRE DE &F_AN_MOINS3 ---
--- TOTAL SORTIE D'IMMOBILISATION AU TITRE DE &F_AN_MOINS2 ---
--- TOTAL SORTIE D'IMMOBILISATION AU TITRE DE &F_AN_MOINS1 ---
--- TOTAL SORTIE D'IMMOBILISATION AU TITRE DE &F_AN_COURAN ---

function.name: afterpform
r_amtlis1formattrigger
function.textSource:
function R_AMTLIS1FormatTrigger return boolean is begin IF ( (NVL(:dc_mt_an_cour,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:dc_mt_an_moins1,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:dc_mt_an_moins2,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:dc_mt_an_moins3,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:dc_mt_an_moins4,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:dc_mt_an_moins5,0)!=0) ) THEN RETURN TRUE; ELSE RETURN FALSE; END IF;
end;

function.name: cf_immo_an5formula
cf_immo_an4formula
cf_immo_an3formula
cf_immo_an2formula
cf_immo_an1formula
cf_immo_an0formula
